Staff, rare (requires attunement by a spellcaster)
Several eagle feathers line the top of this long, thin staff. The staff has 10 charges for the following properties. It regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff explodes into a mass of eagle feathers and is destroyed.
Feather Travel. When you are targeted by a ranged attack while holding the staff, you can use a reaction to teleport up to 10 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see. When you do, you briefly transform into a mass of feathers, and the attack misses. Once used, this property canâ€™t be used again until the next dawn.
Spells. While holding the staff, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.9nMxGFyHBXufsUnu]{conjure animals} (2 giant eagles only, 3 charges), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.9m3weZVFQcscp85O]{fly} (3 charges), or @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.0u1CqWulRC8QY1X6]{gust of wind} (2 charges).
